xwikidoc.content: admin.openproject=OpenProject Macros openproject.config.label=OpenProject Instance Definitions openproject.config.label.hint=Defines access to OpenProject instances and associates an ID to each. This ID can then be used in various OpenProject components whenever a OpenProject instance is required, such as in a parameter for the OpenProject Macros. openproject.config.id=Id openproject.config.url=OpenProject URL openproject.config.clientid=OAUTH clientid openproject.config.secret=OAUTH secret openproject.config.delete=Delete openproject.config.save=Save openproject.config.add=Add OpenProject instance openproject.macros.badurl=No or wrong URL provided for OpenProject instance openproject.macros.authfailed=Authentication failed accessing OpenProject instance openproject.macros.field.assignee.title=Assignee openproject.macros.field.project.title=Project openproject.macros.field.createdAt=Created at openproject.macros.field.id=ID openproject.macros.field.milestone=Milestone openproject.macros.field.status=Status openproject.macros.field.subject=Subject openproject.macros.field.assignee=Assignee openproject.macros.field.priority=Priority openproject.macros.field.type=Type openproject.macros.field.updatedAt=Updated at openproject.macros.field.project=Project openproject.macros.stats.open=Open openproject.macros.stats.closed=Closed openproject.macros.stats.closedrecently=Closed recently openproject.macros.stats.days=days openproject.macros.stats.nb=Nb openproject.macros.graph.days=Days openproject.macros.graph.open=Open openproject.macros.graph.newlyopen=Newly Open openproject.macros.graph.closed=Closed
